description: 🚀 Enhanced user experience by 40% with a hybrid PWA system.
⚡ Optimized POS screens with Astro and Vue.js for 1-second load times.
📋 Standardized commits with BIOME and Lefthook (100% consistency).
⏱️ Reduced response times from 30ms to 5ms (83% improvement).
🛠️ Built Angular 16 banking interfaces with 80%+ test coverage.
📊 Ensured task alignment with BDD criteria using Scrum in Jira.
🐞 Reduced bug resolution time by 25% via Jira optimization.
🔒 Achieved PCI DSS v4.0 compliance, reducing vulnerabilities by 40%.
🛡️ Protected infrastructure with OWASP TOP 10 security standards.
📦 Automated logistics and inventory processes, cutting times by 20%.
💾 Optimized databases with MySQL, improving query efficiency.
🛠️ Resolved IT issues, enhancing system operability by 30%.
💳 Implemented billing and loan management systems to optimize finances.
